oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plan du fort de Carillon et de ses environs avec l'attaque des retranchments faite par une armee Angloise de 25000 homes aux ordre de mylord Abrecrombie le 8e. Iuillet 1758.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chartier de Lotbini√®re, Michel, 1723-1798.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ticonderoga, Battle of, N.Y., 1758--Maps, Manuscript.; Manuscript maps.; Amherst Maps.; Brun Guide.; Maps shelf.; Ticonderoga (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; Fort Ticonderoga (N.Y.)--Maps, Mansuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.; New York (State)--Maps, Manuscript.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Originally part of the papers of Jeffery Amherst.; Encampments of French regiments and direction of British attacks.; Detailed key identifies fortification features.; This is only known plan to identify position of British General James Abercrombie during the battle.; Note below scale states that original from which this copy was made was found among the papers of "Mr de L'aubiniere Engineer 1759 at Quebec."
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: William L. Clements Library Image Bank
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: William L. Clements Library; Jeffrey Amherst Maps
